thread.section_title: AMOMA.com Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von AMOMA.com | www.amoma.com
thread.title: Ken Speake

author: Ken Speake
title: Ken Speake
text: From my experience as a customer service manager, the measure of any company's customer service can be seen in the way they react to customer problems. Therefore, it is no good Amoma putting "We are always thinking about your satisfaction" on its website when it obviously doesn't mean a thing. Finally to end your reply with "regards" just adds insult to injury. Where are the regards?
